snippet: New albums include “Transcendental Youth,” the 14th studio album by the Mountain Goats; “119” from Trash Talk; and “1619 Broadway: The Brill Building Project” from Kurt Elling.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews Transcendental Youth, latest album from folk-rock group The Mountain Goats; Jon Caramanica reviews hardcore band Trash Talk's newest recording 119; Nate Chinen reviews 1619 Broadway: The Brill Building Project, jazz recording by Kurt Elling.

byline.original: By JON PARELES, JON CARAMANICA and NATE CHINEN

lead_paragraph: New albums include “Transcendental Youth,” the 14th studio album by the Mountain Goats; “119” from Trash Talk; and “1619 Broadway: The Brill Building Project” from Kurt Elling.

headline.seo: New Albums by Mountain Goats, Kurt Elling and Trash Talk
headline.main: New Albums by Mountain Goats, Kurt Elling and Trash Talk
